service.name: B2ACCESS
service.description: B2ACCESS is the EUDAT federated cross-infrastructure authorisation and authentication framework for user identification and community-defined access control enforcement. B2ACCESS allows EUDAT users to authenticate themselves using a variety of credentials.
service.userValue: For EUDAT service users and EUDAT service providers who need a single login for EUDAT. B2ACCESS service is a customer facing services provides a federates access to the B2 services in a trusted way.
